name: Cathy
dialogue: So, Ben, have you read any good books lately? I'm always looking for new recommendations.

name: Ben
dialogue: Actually, I just finished reading "The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao" by Junot Díaz. It was incredible. Have you read it?

name: Cathy
dialogue: No, I haven't, but it sounds interesting. I love getting lost in a good book.

name: Ben
dialogue: Me too! There's nothing like escaping into a different world for a while.
